title: Order a copy of a birth, death or marriage certificate

details.description: Order an official birth, marriage or death certificate from the General Register Office (GRO) if you need a copy or want to research your family tree
details.introduction: You’ll need to register on the General Register Office website to order a copy of a birth, adoption, death, marriage or civil partnership certificate. Certificates cost £9.25. You can use this service to help you research your family tree.
details.alternate_methods:
Priority Service

There is a priority service available for £23.40. If you order online by 4pm on a working day, your certificate is sent the next working day by first class post. If you want to use special delivery, contact the General Register Office by phone.

General Register Office
0300 123 1837

Post

You can order certificates by post by completing a form.

Register offices

You can also order certificates from the local register office where the birth, death or marriage was registered.

Scotland and Northern Ireland

Get a copy of a birth, death or marriage certificate in Scotland

Get a copy of a birth, death or marriage certificate in Northern Ireland
